Isn't BrightBlade's corpse rotting in some forest?

::Kluster::

Kluster nods, watching Divitry walk off. He wondered what she had 
gotten from Gangon's memories, but it didn't concern him. He turns to 
Ice.

"You wanted to talk to me a little while ago, right?"




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> DIvitri stared at the wall for a minute, face twisted into a 
concerned horrified face. What the hell was wrong with this guy? 
Well, it was her problems now, she was the living being with the 
guy's memories, now. But he seemed so tormented, so hurt, so 
heartbroken. Divitri seen that he was just an idiot in love, nothing 
more. Then what was he doing here? How was he inside of the base? 
Somebody took him in with them, perhaps? Divitri made up her mind to 
find Gangon's girlfriend. She was nice looking, at least.
> 
> Divitri: Whenever you need me, sir, give me a call, I will come to 
you.
> 
> Divitri said to Kluster.
> 
> Divitri: I have to go at the moment, but I will return shortly 
whether called or not, count on that. I am always at your service, 
even after I am dead.
> 
> Divitri left at that...
